sentences.sentence: He did not feel he had got to know them intimately.
sentences.translation: 他觉得自己不必和他们亲密熟悉。

sentences.sentence: It was the first time they had attempted to talk intimately.
sentences.translation: 这是他们第一次试图私下交谈。

sentences.sentence: She was intimately involved in the project.
sentences.translation: 她已投入到这个项目中。
